summary: This document contains account statements from First Bank for Poplar, Inc., detailing transactions and balances for the months of September and October 2016. It includes instructions for reconciling the account and notes on currency exchange fees applicable to debit card transactions.
locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3 St Thomas VI 00802
keyFacts: The account statements are for Poplar, Inc. and cover the periods ending September 30, 2016, and October 31, 2016.
Both statements show a beginning balance of $0.00 and no transactions recorded.
A 2% currency exchange fee will apply to all debit card transactions in foreign currency effective August 12, 2016.
The document includes instructions for balancing the account statement with the checkbook.
There are multiple references to customer service contact numbers for inquiries related to the account.
